Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Includes temporarily erected structures in the definition of substandard or insanitary area
Summary: Includes temporarily erected structures in the definition of "substandard or insanitary area".
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Amd ยง3, UDC Act; amd ยง502, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the urban development corporation act and the general municipal law, in relation to including temporarily erected structures in the definition of "substandard or insanitary area"
